channel.title: My webclient laggs
channel.description:
Hello, I've made a webclient using Ric's tutorial. Everything works fine but there is only one problem: It laggs like hell. It disconnects every 2 seconds. Does someone know the solution?
Client page: [url=http://www.thomasdomein.nl/yoshi-scape/cgi-bin/nl/webclient.html]http://www.thomasdomein.nl/yoshi-scape/cgi-bin/nl/webclient.html[/url] Jar File: [url=http://www.thomasdomein.nl/yoshi-scape/cgi-bin/nl/client.jar]http://www.thomasdomein.nl/yoshi-scape/cgi-bin/nl/client.jar[/url] Cache zip: [url=http://www.thomasdomein.nl/yoshi-scape/cache.zip]http://www.thomasdomein.nl/yoshi-scape/cache.zip[/url]

item.title: My webclient laggs
item.dc:creator: @thomas27 thomas27
item.description:
@thomas27 wrote:

Why are we discussing about adverting?
Why don’t you guys just help me.

How are you able to help me without a client and the cache?

Read full topic

item.title: My webclient laggs

hay mate it could be the source you were useing that happened to me once so i made my own
[/quote]

Nope. When I use a non edited client it works without any lagg.

fail ad

Why should I advert? I’m only using the ps for my friends. And btw, it’s dutch.[/quote]

y shouldnt u ad? lol read the rules then u will know

item.description:
@thomas27 wrote:

Hello,
I’ve made a webclient using Ric’s tutorial.
Everything works fine but there is only one problem:
It laggs like hell. It disconnects every 2 seconds.
Does someone know the solution?
